hero.title: med spa located in meridian, idaho
hero.text: It is our mission to deliver beautiful and natural results while maintaining safety and professionalism.

data.text: Rachel is absolutely wonderful, very professional, and knowledgeable. She takes the time to answer questions and address any concerns. Not to mention she does a great job!
data.title: Alyssa C.

data.text: Rachel is absolutely amazing! Hands down best service and results ever! My first experience with lips was done by someone else and my lips dissolved so fast and when I met Rachel she listened attentively and gave me EXACTLY what I wanted with amazing results!This woman is a goddess! I cannot wait to go back to her in a fewweeks for another syringe THANK YOU RACHEL!
data.title: Tiffany B.

data.text: Rachel was amazing. She made me feel at ease, was very personable and professional. Definitely will recommend her to anyone and everyone!!
data.title: Angela K.
